casebody.data:
The BRADLEY CENTER, a Pennsylvania Non-Profit Corporation
v.
NORTH STRABANE TOWNSHIP, and Linden Vue Homeowners Association, Inc., and Majestic Hills Homeowners Association Petition of: Linden Vue Homeowners Association, Inc., and Majestic Hills Homeowners Association No. 197 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. October 11, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 11th day of October, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
